ctx: Banka Anglije zvišala obrestno mero za četrt odstotne točke
content:
Zadnja sprememba: crt 04.02.2022 12:42
Four of 9 MPC members voted for hike to 0.75%

BoE sees inflation peaking at 7.25% in April

Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey has urged workers not to ask
for big pay rises this year

:))
